pages.text: This seemingly mystical piece of dirt is made from the $(n)$(l:rituals/activation_ritual)Activation Ritual$(), and has various properties attached to it.$(br2)$(c)Warning: Mobs spawned from cursed earth are stronger than normal, so be prepared!

$(li)Firstly, if exposed to either the sky or other forms of bright light, the block will catch fire to itself and other cursed earth nearby.$(br2)$(li)Secondly, this block is able to spawn mobs depending on the biome it is placed in.$(br2)$(li)Thirdly, if stood on for too long, entities (excluding the player) will take small amounts of damage.$(br2)$(li)Finally, if placed under a spawner, the spawner will be able to work without the player needing to stand near it.
